meanings.definition: A substance that oxidizes another substance.
meanings.sent1: The oxidizers in the laboratory are used to help with chemical reactions.
meanings.sent2: Fireworks contain oxidizers that make the colors bright and vibrant.
meanings.sent3: The oxidizers at the party were the baking soda and vinegar for the volcano experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted as an oxidizer, fueling her drive to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The oxidizers in the cleaning products remove tough stains effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The oxidizers present in the bleach help in whitening clothes.
meanings.sent2: Rust forms on metal due to the presence of oxidizers in the air.
meanings.sent3: The oxidizers in the kitchen were the spices that added flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Time can be an oxidizer, slowly wearing down even the strongest materials.
meanings.sent5: The oxidizers in the paint react with the metal, creating a protective layer.
